documentation.content:
[View JobSet details](https://console.cloud.google.com/kubernetes/aiml/deployments/jobset/${PROJECT_ID}/${CLUSTER_KIND}/${CLUSTER_LOCATION}/${CLUSTER_NAME}/${NAMESPACE}/${JOBSET_NAME}/observability?project=${PROJECT_ID}).
- To learn how to configure TPUs for GKE [view the documentation](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/concepts/plan-tpus)

conditions.displayName: TPU Tensorcore Utilization is high for: ${JOBSET_NAME}

conditionThreshold.filter: resource.type = "k8s_container" AND metric.type = "kubernetes.io/container/accelerator/tensorcore_utilization" AND resource.labels.project_id="${PROJECT_ID}" AND resource.labels.cluster_name="${CLUSTER_NAME}" AND resource.labels.location="${CLUSTER_LOCATION}" AND resource.labels.namespace_name="${NAMESPACE_NAME}" AND metadata.user_labels."jobset.sigs.k8s.io/jobset-name"="${JOBSET_NAME}"
